item.description:
This walk will be from Starbucks Coolidge Corner to the Starbucks near the Hynes Convention Center, where Jay will have his paintings on display. We will stop in for a short break to view his work and then walk back.

Meet outside in front of Stabucks at 7:00. Plenty of parking in the area.

In the interest of fairness and balance I would like to add that I prefer Dunkin Donuts. : )
item.name: Artshow walk
